trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Expõe <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref> tipos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Provides initialization for base class values when called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a inicialização para valores de classe base quando chamado pelo construtor de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for a data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> para um item de dados no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>coleta deste <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The data item that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O item de dados que está associado a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> created.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> criado.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> para o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The item to get an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: O item para obter um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> para.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> para o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> should return <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> objects for child items that are not virtualized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref> deve retornar <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> objetos para os itens filho que não virtualizados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> should return <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> objects for child items that are not virtualized; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> should return <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> objects all child items.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref> deve retornar <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> objetos para os itens filho que não são virtualizados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref> deve retornar <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> objetos todos os itens filho.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an element by the specified property value.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um elemento pelo valor da propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The item in the container after which to begin the search.
trans-unit.target: O item no contêiner depois do qual iniciar a pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The property that contains the value to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade que contém o valor a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: The value to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Valor a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: The first item that matches the search criterion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no items match.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro item que corresponda ao critério de pesquisa; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se nenhum item corresponde.
